column4: would the live cd version of the new release work with a resolution of 1024*786 on a dell 500m (knoppix did not) , it seams to have been a problem http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=96673&highlight=500m has this been fixed?
the 7.04 beta works on my Dell Inspiron 500m at 1024x768
00:02.0 VGA compatible controller: Intel Corporation 82852/855GM Integrated Graphics Device (rev 02)
